object.name: StickerSet
object.description: This object represents a sticker set.
object.rst_description: This object represents a sticker set.

annotations.description: Type of stickers in the set, currently one of 'regular', 'mask', 'custom_emoji'
annotations.html_description: Type of stickers in the set, currently one of “regular”, “mask”, “custom_emoji”
annotations.rst_description: Type of stickers in the set, currently one of 'regular', 'mask', 'custom_emoji'
annotations.name: sticker_type

annotations.description: Sticker set thumbnail in the .WEBP, .TGS, or .WEBM format
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sticker set thumbnail in the .WEBP, .TGS, or .WEBM format
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sticker set thumbnail in the .WEBP, .TGS, or .WEBM format
annotations.name: thumbnail

annotations.description: True, if the sticker set contains animated stickers
annotations.html_description: True, if the sticker set contains animated stickers
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the sticker set contains `animated stickers <https://telegram.org/blog/animated-stickers>`_
annotations.name: is_animated

annotations.description: True, if the sticker set contains video stickers
annotations.html_description: True, if the sticker set contains video stickers
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the sticker set contains `video stickers <https://telegram.org/blog/video-stickers-better-reactions>`_
annotations.name: is_video
